# SetUp

```{r}
pacman::p_load(
  tidyverse,
  glow,
  viridisLite)

Data <- arrow::read_parquet(
  "Data/AllPrefecture.parquet"
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    Size = 面積... |> as.numeric(),
    Price = 取引価格.総額./1000000 |> as.numeric()
  ) |> 
  select(
    Size,
    Price
  ) |> 
  na.omit()

Data |> 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = Size,
      y = Price
    )
  ) +
  geom_bin2d()

```
